greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 1, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where A(n,k) is Sum_{d|n} k^(d-1).
formula: G.f. of column k: Sum_{j>=1} x^j/(1 - k*x^j).
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := DivisorSum[n, If[k == # - 1 == 0, 1, k^(# - 1)] &]; Table[T[k + 1, n - k - 1], {n, 1, 11}, {k, 0, n - 1}] // Flatten (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 07 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jun 26 2019
